oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Funeral Invitation of William Alexander Sumner
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Small notice inviting friends and members of local Masonic lodges to attend the funeral of William Alexander Sumner. The notice is bordered in black.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Invitations; Funeral rites & ceremonies
Invitation cards
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With the arrival of the undertaker, a whole new industry was born - printed funeral invitations, increasingly elaborate coffins, mass-produced funeral souvenirs and, finally, in the mid-19th century, private cemeteries.
